updated_cases.title: Verify whether Rest API V1 does not work when we enable exact_regex_url_list_enabled  feature is enabled
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify whether Rest API V1 does not work when we enable exact_regex_url_list_enabled  feature is enabled
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1.Enable exact_regex_url_list_enabled feature
2.Create the regex url list
3.using Rest API v1 try to modify the urllist
4.We should not be able be update the list
updated_cases.custom_expected: API should throw an error message

updated_cases.title: Verify healthcheck failure when the edgeproxy to internet access fails
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Update staged config to False
- Make edgeproxy node not reachable to internet
- Check the HC failure logs for Internet access
updated_cases.custom_expected: Healthcheck on edgeproxy should fail as it is not able to access internet

updated_cases.title: Verify the policy name in  hold_until_proven application event
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify the policy name in  hold_until_proven application event
updated_cases.custom_expected: Policy name should be present in the application event

updated_cases.title: Validate SSL DND traffic with NSClient Access method; Applied Dedicated EgressIP on Nsproxy ; DEIP is used when the policy is matched
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Pre-Req: VPOP is enabled
- Create Egress IP policy; with combination of supported attributes
- Create and SSL DND policy for a domain/category/ supported attribute
- Route the traffic through NS-Client for a domain configured in SSL DND policy and not matching egressIP Policy
- Check that DEIP is used
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Validate DEIP is applied when dei policy is matched
- Capture so_mark and user-hash from proxy logs and validate DEI is evaluated
- Validate SSL DND policy applied and page events generated.

updated_cases.title: ENG-394934-Verify that when TSS/DLP policy bailed out , as a fall back action file filter policy gets hit
updated_cases.custom_summary: When TSS/DLP policy failed or errors out then proxy should  look for file filter policy as the fallback action
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Disable encryption license

Disable all DLP related policies

Staged config



{
          "name": "tss-service-health-check",
          "data": {"enabled": true},
          "apply-globally": true
        }
Modify /opt/ns/common/remote/nsproxy-tss-healthcheck and restart mtnsproxy



{
    "enabled":          true,
    "host":             "127.0.0.5", // <-- change to a unreachable destination
    "port":             9101,
    "path":             "/healthcheck",
    "head-request":     true,
    "success-status":   200,
    "interval":         5,
    "num-failure":      3,
    "num-success":      3,
    "timeout":          2
}
Add a rule matching executable and action is block. then test with cfg 1 dapii policy netsvc 2 ssl tcp appdetect appmodule httpdump dispatch httpmod httpreq httpres 3 file_filter httpdump 4

download the full file https://download.microsoft.com/download/a/1/d/a1dbae59-3d1d-4409-ba29-cba45be1feb0/visio2016-kb5002349-fullfile-x86-glb.exe multiple times with debug log enabled 

file filter profile should detect MS-DOS/Windows Program (exe). (Please take a note that if there is any match to non exe)

Log should be 



Result of file filter lookup, ret: 1, unKnownResult: 0, file_type: MS-DOS/Windows Program (exe)
Log should not be 



# 1

updated_cases.title: ENG-456569 [Macquarie]Traffic action on DLP rule ineffective
updated_cases.custom_summary: DLP policy with match action as “Alert“ and Traffic action as “Alert“ , Traffic action is not hit when dlp profile is not matched; with File filter feature is enabled
updated_cases.custom_steps:
set of policies as below, 

1. Allow RTP for Browse, Login activities matching specific category

2. DLP policy with match action as “Alert“ and Traffic action as “Alert“ - with same category match.

Action for each profile is set to yes

3. RTP policy with block action - matching same category. 
- Route traffic not matching DLP profile traffic
updated_cases.custom_expected: - As DLP scan will return no DLP profile match., Hence Policy engine should hit traffic action from policy 2 and policy Alert should generated with Traffic action.

updated_cases.title: ENG-156477: Request blocked with HTTP header profile still leaks
updated_cases.custom_preconds:
Enable native_app_access_notification feature flag
curl -v -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"native_app_access_notification":{"enabled":true}}' "http://provisionervip:6400/dp/config/sync?tenantid=6550"
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Create profile with http header for git url
Create policy using above http header profile
Perform git push from native app i.e CLI
Check request is blocked and alerts are seen

updated_cases.title: ENG-422240: Unsupported content inspection (tss) selection for Send activity, leading to unexpected allow
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Create below policy in order
  - TSS profile matching “Send, Publish, Upload, Download“ with all category
  - DLP block policy
  - App based policy 
Send email with Malicious file from logging into gmail
Check activity is blocked with  RTP policy matching TSS profile
updated_cases.custom_expected: Sending email should be blocked with tss policy

updated_cases.title: ENG-464417:UI is allowing us to create header profile without any name
ENG-446388 Google Cloud Pub/Sub error caused dpurldbdownloader2 to stop updating URL DB
updated_cases.custom_steps:
make a situation for the subscription to get a 404 response

edit /opt/ns/python-apps/dpurldbdownloader2/app-env/lib/python3.8/site-packages/dpurldbdownloader/gcp.py line 245



try:
            self.sub_name += '-test' # add this line
            future = self.subscriber.subscribe(self.sub_name, callback)
restart the service
supervisorctl restart dpurldbdownloader2
updated_cases.custom_expected: The service should terminate after receiving 404, this can be monitored via observing log for these lines
